CustomField.description: wd field Indicates if you need to add a sales campaign to work this contact or to create an opportunity. Add an additional response only if you need to create an additional opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Open"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Unqualified"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Recycled"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Customer")), IMAGE("/resource/1493318320000/fccrm_Add_Campaign_Image","Add a Response",16,180), IF ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Active Opportunity (System Value)"), IMAGE("/resource/1493318320000/fccrm_Additional_Response_Image","Additional Opportunity Requires Response",16,180), IMAGE("resource/1493318320000/fccrm_Has_Campaign_Image","Has Response",16,180)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if you need to add a sales campaign to work this contact or to create an opportunity. Add an additional response only if you need to create an additional opportunity.
CustomField.label: Response:
